title: Turncoat

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Make a list of three players to plan to attack. You will attack once per night, moving down the list. Make a new list once you have gone through all three players.
- Twice per game, you can publicly announce a faction to change to at the end of a day. Your role stays the same, except for the win goal.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a target is already dead, your next attack will be upgraded to powerful.
- Your attack is independent of the Factional Mafia Kill.

desc:
Post 717
*I don't think associating with people who are notorious for betrayal is a good idea.*
